amendment.description: Amendment sought to limit funds for the surface transportation inspection program to not more than $20 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to limit the amount of funds available for surface transportation security inspectors to $20 million. The limitation shall not apply to the National Explosives Detection Canine Training Program and Visible Intermodal Prevention and Response Teams.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Turner (NY) amendment (A040) Failed by recorded vote: 101 - 314 (Roll no. 367).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Turner (NY) amendment (A040) Failed by recorded vote: 101 - 314 (Roll no. 367).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A040) offered by Mr. Turner (NY).
